ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: I wasn t talking about the coin.  I was referring to the person that said SS BP or White dragon scale.  You are right if he only gets a coin, he is getting
ygData.messageBody:
I wasn't talking about the coin. I was referring to the person that said SS
BP or White dragon scale. You are right if he only gets a coin, he is
getting ripped.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 4:21 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...



Gouge the guild coffers? Say what you want but if someone trades this item
for a kaesora coin, it ain't the guild getting gouged.
"Nygaardr, FC3" <nygaardr@...> wrote: "-- Immediate entrance to
the guild
(Exceptions like this happen more often than you think)"

Yeah but not for people who are trying to gouge the guild coffers. lol

Mu

Very nice weapon but not worth the white dragon scale or a SS BP. On my
server at least the white dragon scale=epic. You can buy the red scale
pretty easy. The white dragon scale is a HUGE bottle neck.



-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 12:27 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...



/e Bonks Talies on the head!
white dragonscale
or
Singing steel BP
or
Harmonic dagger and sionachi (both)
or
Breath of Harmony
or
Drums of the beast/lute of the howler/selos drum
*** AND ***
-- Immediate entrance to the guild
(Exceptions like this happen more often than you think)

. Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
I know - it's freaky, don't know how it happened, but I also don't want to
take advantage of the guild, seeing as I want to join when I reach 30th
(minimum requirement for me to join).

Is the Lute of the Howler tradeable? I thought it was nodrop...
hrm - I see that it is not.

How about this - request the Lute of the Howler (what's the worst he can
say? No?), and the ancient coins from Kaesora, Dalnir and City of
Mist? I've already got a bloodgill coin, and I see that the others are not
too hard. That would get me two out of four really good instruments, not
bad for a young bard...

Talies the Wanderer
